EmailTemplate.description: RO4W initiated in FET, Case <Case#> created in 'Freestyle Support Tool' , please review the AMOA form attached to the case
EmailTemplate.name: FS RO4W created Case
EmailTemplate.subject: RO4W initiated in FET, Case {!Case.CaseNumber} created in 'Freestyle Support Tool' , please review the AMOA form attached to the case.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Relocation - {!Case.Related_Installation_Name__c} has been created in the Freestyle Execution Tool by Sales Support against {!Case.From_Account__c}.
As a result, the Freestyle Support Tool now reflects Case {!Case.CaseNumber} which also includes the AMOA form for your review.
Please reach out to Sales Support for any additional questions if required.
{!Case.FACT_Thread_ID__c}
